TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構，並傳遞給事件，當您呼叫或方法虛擬模式中的控制項。The is constructed and passed to the event when you call the or methods on a control in virtual mode. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#480](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#480)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#480](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#480)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint Direction { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint Direction
Public ReadOnly Property Direction As SearchDirectionHint
public: property System::Windows::Forms::SearchDirectionHint Direction { System::Windows::Forms::SearchDirectionHint get(); };

summary.span: 取得從目前項目開始，搜尋應進行的方向。

span.span: Gets the direction from the current item that the search should take place.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 識別在最接近的項目控制可以根據應用程式執行的作業系統而有所不同; 因此，搜尋方向是提示，但無法絕對保證結果。Identifying the nearest item in a control can vary depending on the operating system the application is running on; therefore, the search direction is a hint, and not an absolute guarantee of results. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以指定想要的文字的子字串。The property can specify a substring of the desired text. 屬性會指出搜尋是否應該符合搜尋文字的開頭的項目。The property indicates whether the search should match items that start with the search text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以搜尋控制項所使用的位置方法，或者您可以使用執行檢索方法。You can search a control by location by using the method, or you can perform a text search by using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
